subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets added to their inventory of starting pitchers by signing the right-hander Liván Hernández to a minor league contract. The move reunites Hernández with General Manager Omar Minaya, who acquired him in 2003 with Montreal and has tried several times to bring him to the Mets. He will compete with Tim Redding and Freddy García for the fifth spot in the rotation.
